string-array.name: indiecs_des_cl
string-array.item: With sunny weather and fresh air, it’s the perfect timing for morning exercises.
Some weather-conditions may influence your exercises, but not much.
Some weather-conditions affect your exercises and it’s not a good timing.
The weather-conditions are against your exercises and please avoid outdoor exercise.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_cy
string-array.item: Short suit, T-shirt and summer clothes.
Spring and Autumn clothes like thin suit etc.
Lined clothes , suit and thin sweater.
Spring and Autumn clothes like thick coat, sweater etc.
Winter clothes like padded jacket, sweater etc.
Midwinter clothes like thick down jacket etc.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_dy
string-array.item: It’s fit for fishing with bright sunlight and breeze. You will have a good time.
The weather conditions have a little influence on fishing, but it’s still okay.
Bad weather for fishing and you can try other forms of entertainment.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_ffz
string-array.item: Choose a day like this and fly a kite, you can stretch your legs and feel relaxed.
It’s suitable for flying a kite if you choose a proper place.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_fs
string-array.item: If you stay outdoors for a long time, please use sun care products with SPF 8-12.
The suggestion is to use sun care products with SPF 8-12 and PA+.
The advice is to use sun care products with SPF higher than 8-12 and PA+.
Take more precautions before going out and use sun care products with SPF 15-20 and PA+ +.
Sun protection product with SPF higher than 20 and PA++ is recommended, before going out special protection is necessary.
Take more precautions before going out and use sun care products with SPF higher than20 and PA+ +.
Take more precautions before going out and use sun care products with SPF higher than20 and PA+ +.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_fh
string-array.item: Pay attention to add or reduce clothes when doing outdoor activities.
When doing outdoor activities, please wear thick clothes, and the elderly and weak people should keep warm properly.
When doing outdoor activities, please wear gloves and a hat to keep warm.
When doing outdoor activities, please wear thick gloves and hats. The elderly should avoid going out for a long time.
If you still feel cold with a down jacket and leather coat, please wear thick leather gloves and hat when doing outdoor activities.
When it’s frozen outside, it can easily result in bare skin frostbite. Please avoid working in the field going out.
The temperature does not achieve the required low temperature cold, a little cold ready to.
The temperature does not achieve the required low temperature cold, a little cold ready to.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_gm
string-array.item: The weather is proper and favorable ,with low probability of having a cold.
It’s easy to catch a cold. The people who are delicate take precautions please.
It’s likely to have a cold and please protect yourself from cold.
The probability is very high. Please wear more clothes in case of catching a cold.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_gj
string-array.item: It’s a good day for going shopping. You’ll have fun.
The weather conditions may influence your activity, but it’s okay.
It’s little fit for shopping and please stay inside as possible as you can.
It’s a terrible weather to go shopping and please choose indoor activities.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_hc
string-array.item: It’s sunny and warm, a perfect day for boating.
Some weather conditions may have little influences on boating activity.
It’s a bad weather for boating and please choose other entertainments or take some precautions.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_hz
string-array.item: It’s cold and use more moisturizing cosmetic products and a lip stick.
The skin is easily lack of water and remember to use moisturizing cosmetic products, like cream, a lip stick etc.
We suggest that the ladies should use the gel quality cream as base, water quality oil-free foundation cream, transparent pressed powder, and silty rouge.
When it’s hot, people get sweaty and it’s better to use cosmetics with high water-proof quality and SPF. Additionally, you’d better powder more often

string-array.name: indiecs_des_jt
string-array.item: The weather is good for traffic and the vehicles move regularly.
The weather is okay, but not suitable for high speed running. The driver need to be more concentrated and keep the gap between cars.
The weather is not so good. The braking distance is prolonged and there are more accidents in this kind of situation. Please be careful with driving.
The weather is bad for traffic good for accidents. The vehicles should maintain low speed.
It’s a too bad weather. Drive your car very slowly. It’s better stay inside.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_kqwr
string-array.item: The weather is good for diluting, diffusing and eliminating air pollution and it’s safe to stay outdoors.
The weather is helpful for diluting, diffusing and eliminating air pollution and it’s okay to stay outdoors.
The weather does not have an obvious influence on air pollution. The susceptible population should shorten the period of time for out-door activities.
It’s less helpful for cleaning air and please shorten your period of time for outdoor activities properly.
It can’t help clear air at all, so please avoid outdoor stay for a long period of time.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_kt
string-array.item: It’s stuffy and it’s necessary to open air-conditioners to get cold air.
You can turn your air-conditioner on when it’s too hot.
It’s hot at noon and it’s okay to open air-conditioners after noon.
You feel very comfortable with air-conditioners off.
It’s cold and you need to open air-conditioners to get warm.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_ls
string-array.item: It’s fit for drying. Get your stuff out to enjoy the sunlight.
The warm sunlight after noon still can drive away the humidity and disinfect. It’s ok to dry your stuff.
It’s not a proper weather for drying. I f you have to do it, please choose an airy place.
It’s unfit for drying. You only can do this indoors and make sure windows and doors closed if needed.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_lk
string-array.item: The pavement is dry and good for traffic.
Some pavements are wet and vehicles slip easily. Please be careful with driving.
Some are wet and slippery. So please keep proper gap and run slowly.
The pavement condition is not good with covering snow. Please watch out.
The pavement is with ice on it and it’s better not to go out. Please be on alert, if you have to go outdoors.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_ly
string-array.item: It’s fit for travel, with bright sunlight and breeze.
It’s still a good day for travel, though maybe cloudy or windy.
It may be overcast, windy, windy, or even a dusty storm. The condition for travel is so so.
People will feel uncomfortable under the possible weather like rain and snow, strong wind and heavy fog etc. It’s little fit for travel.
The weather, such as heavy rain and snow, strong wind, ice rain and dust storm etc, is too bad for go traveling.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_mf
string-array.item: It’s good for hairdressing and can provide a healthy and clean environment for your hair.
Some weather factor would affect your hair growing and please pay attention to protection.
The weather conditions will influence hairdressing and please take some measures to protect your hair.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_pj
string-array.item: Please drink little beer as possible as you can proper amount of beer with room temperature is acceptable.
It’s cool. We suggest that people drink a little normal temperature beer.
You can drink some beer, but you must make the maximum amount about 50%1$-60%2$ of your capacity of liquor.
Drinking beer can make you feel cool and cold in a hot day and you have to control the maximum amount at 60%1$-70%2$ of your capacity of liquor.
The hot weather may increase your desire for a cold beer, but be careful not to drink too much!

string-array.name: indiecs_des_ssd
string-array.item: It is not too hot nor too cold during the day, with little wind, people will feel more refreshing and comfortable.
It’s warm and sometimes even a little muggy, but most people still feel comfortable.
It’s hot and people feel less comfortable.
The stuffy weather makes people very uncomfortable.
It’s too hot to feel comfortable and please be sure stay cool and avoid getting a heatstroke.
It is not too hot nor too cold during the day, with little wind, people will feel more refreshing and comfortable.
It’s cool in the morning and evening, but most people feel comfortable.
A cold weather makes people not so comfortable and please wear more clothes in case catching a cold.
People feel very cold and very uncomfortable and please keep warm and get rid of coldness.
A chilly weather makes people extremely uncomfortable and please wear more clothes to keep warm.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_xc
string-array.item: The weather of next two days is good, no rain. It’s fit for car-washing.
Tomorrow is rainless and it’s okay to wash cars.
It’s little fit for car-washing, because it may get dusty.
It’s unfit for car-washing, because the muddy water will stain your car.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_xq
string-array.item: It’s sunny, bright, air-moist and breezy. A nice day makes people feel pleasant.
It’s comfortable and you feel energetic, pleasant and ambitious.
A foggy day makes people feel depressed and blue.
The cloudy, rainy dusty, stormy weather and muddy air arouse bad mood and terrible feeling.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_ysh
string-array.item: It’s sunny and you can totally enjoy your nightlife and don’t worry about the weather.
Although it’s gonna be windy, rainy or snowy, you still can have a great time with full preparations.
It’s not suitable for stay outdoors and we suggest that live your nightlife indoors.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_ys
string-array.item: It’s barely rainy and there’s no need to bring an umbrella.
It may be rainy or snowy. It’s okay to stay out for a short time without an umbrella.
There will be light rain, light snow or moderate snow and you’d better bring your umbrella.
It will have heavy rain or heavy snow, so please carry an umbrella when you go out, in case getting wet.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_yh
string-array.item: It’s a great day for have a dating with bright sunshine and comfortable breeze.
The weather maybe not so perfect, but you still can have a nice dating.
The out door dating maybe not so delightful because of some weather factors. An indoor warm and pleasant talk would be good.
The weather is unfit for out door dating. It’s better not to take a girl out shopping, if you are a boy.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_yd
string-array.item: It’s a nice day for outdoor sports with weak ultraviolet radiation.
It’s appropriate for low-intensity indoor sports and outdoor sports need sun care and getting sheltered.
For strong wind, air pressure, strong ultraviolet radiation, too hot or too cold etc, it’s unfit for sports.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_zs
string-array.item: It’s not hot and the weather is favorable. People won’t get heatstroke.
It’s a little hot and getting a heatstroke is possible. The weak people should stay cool and avoid sunlight exposure and working in high-temperature environment.
It’s hot and easy to get a heatstroke. The weak group should stay cool and avoid sunlight exposure and working in high-temperature environment.
It’s too hot and please be sure stay cool and avoid sunlight exposure and working in high-temperature environment in case of getting a heatstroke.
It’s extremely hot and working in a high-temperature environment is too risky. Please be sure to stay cool.

string-array.name: indiecs_des_zwx
string-array.item: It is weak ultraviolet-radiation weather. No special protection is needed. If you stay outdoors for a long time, use sun care products with SPF 8-12.
The ultraviolet radiation is weak and the suggestion is to use sun care products with SPF 12-15 and PA+ before going out doors.
It is mediate ultraviolet radiation weather and please use sun care products with SPF higher than15 and PA+ ,and wear a hat, sunglasses before going out doors.
The ultraviolet radiation is strong and the suggestion is to use sun care products with SPF 20 and PA+ +. Do not stay in the sun from 10 am to 2pm.
The ultraviolet radiation is very strong and the advice is to use sun care products with SPF higher than 20 and PA+ +. Do not expose yourself in the sun.

string-array.name: indices_brief_kt
string-array.item: Run for a long period of time
Run for a short period of time
